title: The Irish R.M.
description: By the same authors as "French Leave" and "An Enthusiast" this book is a collection of stories first published at the turn of the century and were considered some of the funniest prose in the English language. They have more recently inspired the television series of the same name.Originally published in 1928 as The Irish R.M. and His Experiences.
author: Edith Å’none Somerville
